p: The concentration of TNF- α (SEA133Ra), IL-1 β (SEA563Ra), IL-6 (SEA079Ra), IL-18 (SEA064Ra), and articular elastase (SEA181Ra) in serum of treated rats was measured with a microplate reader (ELX-800, BIOTEK, USA) by enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay (ELISA) kits (Uscn Kit Inc., Wuhan, China) according to the manufacturer's instructions.
